text:
De'Runnya S. Wilson (September 14, 1994 – January 21, 2020) was an American football player. He played as a wide receiver. At the time of his death in 2020, he played for Albany Empire of the Arena Football League (AFL). He played college football at Mississippi State. He was born in Birmingham, Alabama.
Wilson died on January 21, 2020 in Birmingham, Alabama. He was 25. Police treated his death as a murder.
